backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing main frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining navy and saffron theme using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with SEO metadata, Inter font loading, and root div for mounting the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React landing page component with hero, exam categories, feature cards, stats, and structured layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity React context providing login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook wired to actor for future backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles defining updated navy and saffron design tokens, typography, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point mounting React with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme utilities. Includes imported plugins and extensive OKLCH-based color tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, image needs, and architectural notes for building the Knowledge IQ educational website. Tracks project versioning, known issues, and planned functionality.
